description: Kuro is the older, more hardened half of the orphan duo who live together in an abandoned car under a freeway and protect Treasure Town from outside forces. The lost innocent, agressive, and an impetuous force of violence, Kuro is the child forced to grow up. If there`s no turning back for Kuro, his goal is to save what`s left of Shiro`s innocence. Kuro needs Shiro to feel worthy and to maintain his hope in the world.
name: Kuro
